author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Sharon Bio-Medicine's board meeting on November 10, 2016
description: Sharon Bio-Medicine Ltd has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on November 10, 2016, to take on record the Unaudited Financial Results for the Quarter ended September 30, 2016 along with the Limited Review Report.
articleBody: Sharon Bio-Medicine Ltd has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on November 10, 2016, inter alia:- To take on record the Unaudited Financial Results for the Quarter ended September 30, 2016 along with the Limited Review ReportFurther, as per the Company's Code of Conduct for Prevention of Insider Trading, framed pursuant to the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015, the trading window for dealing in the securities of the Company will be closed from November 03, 2016 to November 12, 2016 (both days inclusive) for the purpose of declaration of financial results of the Company for the quarter ended September 30, 2016. Accordingly, all the Directors and Designated Employees of the Company have been intimated not to enter into any transaction involving the securities of the Company during the aforesaid period of closure of trading window.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Sharon Bio Medi

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'Faizan Javed'}
headline: Sharon Bio-Medicine gets USFDA nod for API plant in Taloja
description: The company, however, said it cannot start supplying to the US market as its payment for generic drug user fee is pending.
articleBody: Sharon Bio-Medicine today said it has received approval from the US health regulator for its API plant at Taloja in Maharashtra. The company, however, said it cannot start supplying to the US market as its payment for generic drug user fee is pending. In a BSE filing, Sharon Bio Medicine said it has &quot;received the Establishment Inspection Reports from the US Food and Drug Administration (USFDA)&quot;. The inspection was conducted during June 29, 2015 to July 7, 2015 at the Taloja plant, it added. &quot;The API (active pharmaceuticals ingredients) is now approved by USFDA,&quot; the company said. It may be noted that the payment for Generic Drug User Fee is pending and therefore supply to the US cannot be done unless pending arrears are cleared, it said without disclosing details. Shares of Sharon Bio Medicine were trading at Rs 10.16 in the afternoon trade, up 19.95 percent on BSE.
tags: Business, Sharon Bio Medicine, Taloja, US health

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: USFDA inspects Sharon Bio-Medicine's Dehradun-based plant
description: USFDA had inspected company's manufacturing facility at Taloja near Navi Mumbai last month, it added.
articleBody: Drug firm Sharon Bio-Medicine on Tuesday said the US health regulator has inspected one of its formulation plants in Dehradun. &quot;In the last week one of our formulation plants at Dehradun in Uttarakhand has been inspected and audited by US Food and Drug Administration (USFDA) officials,&quot; Sharon Bio-Medicine said in a BSE filing. USFDA had inspected company's manufacturing facility at Taloja near Navi Mumbai last month, it added. &quot;This is our second plant which has been inspected and audited by USFDA officials in the last two months. First plant at Taloja near Navi Mumbai was inspected and audited in the first week of July 2015,&quot; the company said. Last month, USFDA had issued a warning letter to the firm for failing to pay generic drug user fee by its owner for three years starting 2013, saying its Dehradun-based facility would be barred from shipping products to the US if the dues are not cleared. Sharon Bio-medicine shares were trading at Rs 21.30, up 20 percent, apiece on the BSE.
tags: BSE, Business, drug, Navi Mumbai, Sharon Bio Medicine, Taloja, US Food and Drug Administration, US health regulator, USFDA

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Sharon Bio-Medicine receives certificate from UKMHRA
description: Sharon Bio-Medicine Ltd has informed BSE that the  Company have received the certification for the approval of Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP) for both, Capsules and Tablets from United Kingdom - Medical &amp; Health Care Product Regulatory Agency (UKMHRA) for its expanded area of Formulation and Tablets unit located at Selaqui, Uttarakhand.
articleBody: Sharon Bio-Medicine Ltd has informed BSE that the  Company have received the certification for the approval of Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP) for both, Capsules and Tablets from United Kingdom - Medical &amp; Health Care Product Regulatory Agency (UKMHRA) for its expanded area of Formulation and Tablets unit located at Selaqui, Uttarakhand.In the view of the above it should be noted that after the expansion the production capacity of the Company's Formulation and Tablets plant located at Selaqui, Uttarakhand has been doubled in the term of production.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Sharon Bio Medi
